doc.after: The terminal has gates and a nearby runway that can handle the Airbus A380 which were proven when Singapore Airlines briefly offered A380 flights to Beijing in August 2008 during the Summer Olympics Emirates airline has started its scheduled daily operation to Dubai as of 1 August 2010 Lufthansa uses these facilities since October 2010 to handle up to five A380 connections per week China Southern Airlines operates their A380 between Beijing Shanghai Beijing Guangzhou and Beijing Hong Kong Several other airlines in the near future will operate the A380 out of this terminal including Malaysia Airlines and British Airways
